channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Clear just increased its annual price for users by $10
item.description: As of Aug. 1, the annual price of Clear is up $10 and will now cost $199, per a company spokesperson. The expedited airport security program is curren...

item.title: United Airlines significantly improves basic economy fares with a key change
item.description: Of all the major U.S. airlines, United Airlines’ basic economy fare is perhaps the most punitive. Travelers purchasing the cheapest basic economy fare...

item.title: Bidding is open: Redeem Choice points for VIP college football experiences

item.title: You can book The New York Edition for less than 50,000 points right now
item.description: New York City hotels are notoriously expensive, but that doesn’t mean there aren’t good deals out there if you’re willing to be flexible. For a little...

item.title: Virgin Hotels London-Shoreditch is now open
item.description: In London, it’s out with the old and in with the new. The Mondrian Shoreditch, one of TPG’s best new hotels of 2021, has officially been reflagged as ...
